explains: adv. 空间地；存在于空间地

sentences.en: The last dimension, how everything relates, is implied spatially.
sentences.cn: 最后一维（所有内容如何关联）是以空间形式暗示的。

sentences.en: Current work in developing invisibility cloaks tries to hide an object spatially.
sentences.cn: 当前各类开发隐身衣的研究试图将一个物体在空间中隐藏起来。

sentences.en: Men never lose their obsession for impractical, spatially-related toys - they just spend a lot more on them.
sentences.cn: 而男人永远也不会对不切实际的、与空间相关的玩具失去热情——他们只会在那上面花费更多的时间。
